Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form

Class ActionFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.ActionFormController

extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines the form controller.

                                       java.lang.String propertyLabel)
                                throws InternalErrorException
        Adds a custom validation message for a data model property.
        Parameters:
        propertyValidation - String that contains the identifier of the validation.
        propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
        propertyLabel - String that contains the label of the property.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.

      • findForward

        public SystemResources.ActionFormResources.ActionFormForwardResources findForward()
                                                                           throws InternalErrorException
        Finds the forward of the action form.
        Returns:
        Instance that contains the forward of the action form.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
